snippet: Haylie Wagner threw a shutout, and Michigan beat Florida, 1-0, in the Women’s College World Series in Oklahoma City to force a deciding third game for the national championship.
abstract: Michigan beats Florida, 1-0, in Women’s College World Series to force deciding third game for national championship.
lead_paragraph: Haylie Wagner threw a shutout, and Michigan beat Florida, 1-0, in the Women’s College World Series in Oklahoma City to force a deciding third game for the national championship.

headline.main: Michigan Forces Third Game at Women’s College World Series
